fields.request: Manual QA: Exercise admin credential test actions
fields.request_details:
1. Open the Release manager changelist in the Django admin and trigger the Test credentials object action for an existing manager; confirm the success/error messaging still appears.
2. Repeat the Test credentials action from the changelist bulk actions to ensure the refactored handler runs for multiple managers.
3. Visit an Odoo profile and an OpenPay profile and execute their Test credentials actions from both the object and changelist views, confirming the UI labels remain "Test credentials" and their verification messages are unchanged.
